sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RUNNER, in the ſea-language, a rope belonging to the garnet and the two bolt-tackles. It is reeved in a ſingſe block joined to the end of a pendant ; it has at one end a hook to hitch into any thing ; and, at the other, a double block, into which is reeved the fall of the tackle, or the garnet, by which means it purchaſes more than the tackle would without it.
